snippet.title: Facebook and others aim to make the mobile Web a competitive app platform
snippet.description: ...A coalition of 30 technology companies hopes to turn the Web into a competitive platform for building mobile applications. They have launched a Core Mobile Web Platform (coremob) community group through the W3C to provide a venue for collaborating on next-generation mobile Web standards.Facebook...

snippet.title: Applying science to communicate science
snippet.description: ...Anybody who communicates for a living faces a certain degree of frustration. No matter how hard you try, some people just don't get the intended message. For areas like politics and economics, this typically means that some people don't buy in to your interpretation of things. But when it comes to science, the failures end up involving an inability to convey basic facts. No matter how h...

snippet.title: Web tracking firm settles charges it collected passwords, financial data
snippet.description: ...A Web analytics company that tracked the browsing behavior of millions of US consumers has agreed to settle federal charges that it collected credit card numbers, financial account information, and other sensitive data without proper notice.Boston, Massachusetts-based Compete Inc. agreed to obtain...

snippet.title: What's responsive Web design all about?
snippet.description: ...When you consider how many different tablets, laptops, Web browsers, and operating systems access the Internet on a day-to-day basis, it's a small miracle that Web designers and developers manage to stay sane.
